Methodologies to calculate the actual load carrying capacity and fuel consumption by truck are described in Section 3.2.Power production (UP 5) During direct co-firing, biomass and coal are simultaneously fed into the same boiler. Direct co-firing involves blending of biomass and coal followed by processing of the mixture through coal mills, crushers, pulverizer, and burner. However, this technique can be modified for feedstock in the form of pellet and TOP. Feedstock in these forms is mixed with coal after coal milling since it can be crushed evenly and mixed with the milled coal (Maciejewska et al., 2006).
